thread.title: PrinterLogic Named Best of VMworld 2015 Award Finalist in the Virtualization and Cloud Infrastructure Category
thread.title_full: PrinterLogic Named Best of VMworld 2015 Award Finalist in the Virtualization and Cloud Infrastructure Category

title: PrinterLogic Named Best of VMworld 2015 Award Finalist in the Virtualization and Cloud Infrastructure Category
text:
PrinterLogic Named Best of VMworld 2015 Award Finalist in the Virtualization and Cloud Infrastructure Category Award Spotlights Company’s Innovative Enterprise Print Management Solution that Eliminates the Need for Print Servers ET | Source: PrinterLogic 
Saint George, UTAH, Sept. 08, 2015 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- 
PrinterLogic , the leading Enterprise Printer Management solution, today announced that it has been named a “Best of VMworld 2015” Awards Finalist in the Virtualization and Cloud Infrastructure category. The award was announced at the recently concluded VMworld 2015 Conference, which was held in San Francisco. 
According to SearchServerVirtualization.com , the “ Best of VMworld 2015” Awards recognize the most innovative new products in the server virtualization, cloud and end-user computing markets. A panel of expert judges evaluated 153 nominated products on display at VMworld 2015 and named winners in seven categories. 
“We are honored to be recognized as one of the most innovative solutions at VMworld 2015,” said Andrew Miller, Vice President of Marketing at PrinterLogic. “The more than 3,000 conversations we had at the show confirmed that organizations of all sizes want to eliminate print servers and simplify the management of their print environment.” 
According to a recent survey by TechValidate, an independent research organization, PrinterLogic received a Net Promoter Score (NPS) of +66 with an average NPS rating of 8.9 — one of the highest NPS values TechValidate has ever seen. The NPS is a metric for how many current customers would recommend PrinterLogic to a colleague. 
Miller continued, “Our on-premise, web-based application empowers IT to manage their entire print environment from a single administrator console, while enabling end users to install their own printers with a single click. The result is increased ROI and lower costs through the elimination of print servers and reduction of printer-related service desk calls.” 
About SearchServerVirtualization.com 
SearchServerVirtualization.com™ is an enterprise virtualization-focused website providing IT professionals and the community with the latest server virtualization news, articles, tips, and expert advice. Other virtualization information includes webcasts and industry white papers covering all areas of server virtualization, such as virtualization platforms, server hardware, managing virtual environments, virtualization architecture and strategies, application issues, and more. Its sister site SearchVMware.com™, is dedicated to helping IT organizations evaluate products, services and business strategies that can lead them to successful implementations of virtualization technologies in VMware environments. And sister site SearchVirtualDesktop.com™ is the premier source for information on desktop virtualization, application virtualization, and virtual desktop infrastructure. 
About TechTarget 
TechTarget (NASDAQ: TTGT) is the Web’s leading destination for serious technology buyers researching and making enterprise technology decisions. Our extensive global network of online and social media, powered by TechTarget’s Activity Intelligence™ platform, allows technology sales and marketing teams to leverage real-time purchase intent data to more intelligently engage technology buyers and prioritize followup based on active projects, technical priorities and business needs. With more than 120 highly targeted technology-specific websites and a wide selection of custom advertising, branding, lead generation and sales enablement solutions, TechTarget delivers unparalleled reach and innovative opportunities to drive technology sales and marketing success around the world. TechTarget has offices in Atlanta, Beijing, Boston, Cincinnati, London, Munich, Paris, San Francisco, Singapore and Sydney. To learn how you can engage with serious technology buyers worldwide, visit techtarget.com and follow us @TechTarget 
About PrinterLogic 
PrinterLogic is the world's leading Enterprise Printer Management solution for server-less remote site printer deployments. With more than 1,500 customers in over 120 countries, PrinterLogic enables organizations of all sizes to eliminate print servers. PrinterLogic's single integrated printer management platform is an on-premises web application that simplifies the management, migration, and deployment of printers while drastically reducing cost. For more information, or for a free trial, please visit www.printerlogic.com. Questions? Watch our Video or connect with us on Twitter at @PrinterLogic or follow us on Facebook , LinkedIn , YouTube , Instagram and Google+ . press@printerlogic.com
